hudson.tasks.Shell.command: set +x FileName="${WORKSPACE}/prm_${BUILD_ID}.txt" echo "---- export variabili da file ${WORKSPACE}/prm_${BUILD_ID}.txt ----" export $(cat $FileName | xargs) > /dev/null echo "---- export terminata ---" echo "-------------------------------------------------- 1 --------------------------------------------------" echo "-- Esecuzione svn per recupero Tag piu' recente ---" svn --non-interactive --no-auth-cache --username $SVN_USER --password $SVN_PASS ls --xml $URL > ${WORKSPACE}/prm_${TAGS_BRANCHES}_${BUILD_ID}.xml echo "-- Esecuzione svn terminata ---" echo "-------------------------------------------------- 2 -------------------------------------------------" cat ${WORKSPACE}/prm_${TAGS_BRANCHES}_${BUILD_ID}.xml echo "tagsXml=${WORKSPACE}/prm_${TAGS_BRANCHES}_${BUILD_ID}.xml" >> ${WORKSPACE}/prm_${BUILD_ID}.txt echo "--------------------------------------------------- 3 -------------------------------------------------" cat ${WORKSPACE}/prm_${BUILD_ID}.txt echo "--------------------------------------------------- 4 -------------------------------------------------"
